attributes.action: Make the National Lottery run as non profit and just cover costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national lottery should not be run by a private company unless they are willing to run this as non profit to cover costs only.  It should also be put out to tender every 3 years.  This way more money would go to good causes.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
